title: Autobiography of Samuel Smiles ...
author: Smiles, Samuel
snippet: After a long and protracted period — long, because of the numerous interviews with friends of Stephenson, and also because of the few intermittent hours I could give to writing out the results of the interviews m the leisure of my evenings — I at length got the manuscript into shape, and went up to Robert Stephenson's house in Gloucester Square, to read some portions of it over to him and his friend Mr Sopwith. I sought out some of the most interesting parts — his father's early life, and the history of the Safety Lamp.
